meanings.sent1: The emyds in the pond were swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of emyds basking in the sun by the river.
meanings.sent3: The emyds decided to have a race to see who could reach the other side of the pond first.
meanings.sent4: The emyds moved as slowly as time itself, carrying the weight of ancient wisdom on their backs.
meanings.sent5: The emyds' shells were like miniature fortresses, protecting them from any harm.

meanings.sent1: The zookeeper fed the emyds their favorite treats.
meanings.sent2: The emyds were all different colors, making them a beautiful sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The emyds gathered around the emyd, curious to hear its tales of adventure.
meanings.sent4: The emyds stood out in the crowd, each one unique in its own way.
meanings.sent5: The emyds' presence filled the room with a sense of wonder and mystery.
